events.text: Load in save file - or if none exists - load in an empty save file.
Save data to local storage at the end of each level.

actions.text: Clamp mouse position to the viewable screen.

children.text: Make the character stop shrinking when the critical melting value is reached, so that the character is still visible.

actions.text: Rescale the player hitbox, ignoring squash and stretch.
Rescale the player hitbox, ignoring squash and stretch.

parameters.x: Player.progress < 0 ? Player.X + Player.Width / 2 * (1 - Character.squash) : Player.X - Player.Width / 2 * (1 - Character.squash)
Player.progress < 0 ? Player.X - Player.Width / 2 * (1 - Character.squash) : Player.X + Player.Width / 2 * (1 - Character.squash)

actions.text: I didn't feel like making a realistic physics loop but players won't know the difference.
Makes sure the particles' position always moves with the player.
Puts particles underneath the player so that they look like they're on the ground.

children.text: Make sure the direction the particles spray is relative to the direction the player is facing.
Setting the spray rate of the particles realative to the players speed on the ground.

parameters.x: lerp(scrollx, clamp(Player.BBoxMidX, CameraLock.BBoxLeft + 320, CameraLock.BBoxRight - 320), dt * CAM_SPEED)
parameters.y: lerp(scrolly, clamp(Player.BBoxMidY, CameraLock.BBoxTop + 180, CameraLock.BBoxBottom - 180), dt * CAM_SPEED)

children.text: A spring you must stop on to activate.
A spring that flings you horizontally.
Add to world star count if star hadn't already been accounted for.
Check star as being collected in save file.
Check save data if star has been collected.
